item.title: Try to solve a function minimization problem using particle swarm optimization
item.description: # Particle swarm optimization Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) is a type of swarm intelligence used as a solution search method for combinatorial optimization problems. By repeating the update of the two information of particle velocity and position, the process proceeds with the search. The figure below is an image of particle swarm optimization. ##algorithm The algorithm for particle swarm optimization is as follows. Update formula The particle velocity and position are updated using the following update formula.
